sections.heading: Unambiguous language not to be disregardedWhen the language of an article is clear and free from ambiguity, its letter is not to be disregarded under the pretext of pursuing its spirit
sections.text: Unambiguous language not to be disregardedWhen the language of an article is clear and free from ambiguity, its letter is not to be disregarded under the pretext of pursuing its spirit.
